name:
Inazuma Eleven® GO
Chrono Stones: Wildfire
formal_name:
Inazuma Eleven® GO
Chrono Stones: Wildfire
description:
In this huge football RPG, the player
stars as a young schoolboy, Arion
Sherwind, who discovers football has
been erased from existence by an evil
organisation from the future! Recruit
the ultimate squad, travel through
time, and win matches against rivals
to rediscover Arion's friends, and
restore football to its former glory in
Inazuma Eleven GO Chrono Stones:
Wildfire on Nintendo 3DS and 2DS!
